text_block_list.text:
It's been several days since I began<n>my job as a trainer,
and I'm itching to<n>recruit a racer of my own. I'm<n>heading
down to the training grounds<n>when...
Whoosh!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: WATCH OOOUT!
Suddenly, the leg of a desk is flying<n>straight at me!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: A-are you okay? I'm so, so, sooo<n>sorry!

Thanks to the warning, I manage to<n>avoid a very untimely
death... But that<n>still begs the question...
choice_data_list: Since when do desk legs fly?

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
Huh? D-desk legs? Fly? Ah... r-r-right!<n>Wh-wh-what have I
doooone?!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Wh-wh-wh-what am I going to do<n>NOW?!

Behind her I notice a desk missing<n>one leg. I do my best to
calm down the<n>panicking student, and eventually, I'm<n>able
to get the story out of her.

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
I-I... I'm pretty much a walking<n>disaster. I can never do
anything right,<n>but, um... Well... I-I still want to help<n>when I
can...

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
So when someone told me Opera O's<n>desk has been
w-wobbly lately... I-I<n>thought I'd fix it for her...

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
But... When I tried to bend it back into<n>place, the leg broke
off instead! I-I<n>panicked, and the next thing I knew...<n>the
desk leg flew out of my hand...

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
I'm sorry! I should've known I would<n>make a mess of
things! And now I<n>involved an innocent trainer too... I'm<n>
the wooorst!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
I-I need to do something before I<n>cause any more
problems... Think,<n>think... I know! I'll just glue the leg<n>back
on and then leave!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
WH-WHYYY?! Why won't you stick<n>to the desk, leg?! A-and
now<n>everything's all sticky...

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: I-I know... I can secure the leg with<n>rope!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: THAT DIDN'T WORK EITHEEER!
Crack!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Hyah?! It broke! Wh-wh-what do I do<n>nooow?!
choice_data_list:
(It's like watching a train wreck in slow
motion...)

text_block_list.text:
It's already late... I'm just about to<n>tell her that she can ask
for a<n>replacement desk tomorrow, when<n>suddenly I hear a
thunderous laugh.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Haaah ha ha ha!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
I was wondering what all that ruckus<n>was about! To think I
would come<n>across such tragedy! My desk, once<n>as
beautiful as me, is in pieces!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
O-O-O-Ope...Ope...Opera O?! I-I'm so<n>sorry! I-I can explain! I
was just—

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: EXCELLENT!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Huh?

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
My shining desk, lying in disarray...<n>Two of its legs strewn
about the floor!<n>The blanket of moonlight draping it in<n>
sorrow!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
What more could I ask for in a display<n>of true grief? Behold,
Doto! Do I not<n>shine all the more against this tragic<n>
backdrop?!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Y-yes! You're shining brightly!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Marvelous! And please, take as<n>many photographs as you
like! You<n>there! Work the fan so that I may<n>have a breeze
to flutter my locks!

Before I know it, I'm working behind<n>the scenes at an
impromptu<n>photoshoot for T.M. Opera O...

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Oho... Excellent shots! Chaos and<n>creation! Despair and
hope! And<n>towering above it all stands I, T.M.<n>Opera O...
Bravo!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
It seems I've underestimated you,<n>Doto! To think you had
such passion<n>for stagecraft!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Huh? N-no, I was, uh, ummm...

T.M. Opera O seems completely<n>oblivious to Doto's anxious<n>
behavior... Beaming with pride, she<n>nods with satisfaction
before<n>continuing.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
My eyes have never deceived me<n>before! Therefore, I have
a proposition<n>for you!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: For my next operatic performance atthe Tracen Meet to be a success, Iwant—nay, I NEED your help!Tales of our fierce battle shall spreadfar and wide!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Huh? B-battle? M-m-m-me?

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Precisely! To you, my dear, I deem a<n>central role in my saga.
You shall be...<n>the villain!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: WHAAAT?!
